# WorldQuest
WorldQuest RPG

![Screenshot](screenshot1.jpg "Screenshot")

## Features

* 2 Maps
* Stairs
* Woodcutting
* Firemaking
* Melee Combat
* Armour
* Weapons
* Digging
* Mining
* Experience
* 2 Enemy Types
* Shop that sells items
* Mining Ores
* Smelting

## Roadmap

Goals for version 1.0

* Selling items
* Messages
* Auto-generated, persistant dungeons
* Auto-generated, persistant surface landscape
* Good conversational AI
* AI with different combat strategies
* Quests
* Smithing
* Crafting
* Ranged weapons
* Magecraft
* Prospecting
